full_text:
In the #nflverse discord (https://t.co/Z8ISpBbnHO)  someone posted this very encouraging message.
This is a great community! https://t.co/P68lkxQM43

Important #nflverse updates: we've reorganized the data automation to push into releases of a single repo (nflverse-data), and will deprecate (ie stop updating) the previous repos. 

We recommend all #rstats users update to nflreadr 1.2.0+ which is now available on ✨CRAN ✨ https://t.co/fcPEVswbMr

Huge thank yous to:

- GitHub Releases for being an awesome resource
- @cboettig for his work on the {piggyback} package that makes working with Releases so darn easy
- @mrcaseb for his support and feedback 
- the #nflverse community for being fantastic and a huge inspiration
